21/ Without mentioning Litecoin, these are the coins that rank highest for me: Bitcoin, Monero, and Decred.
15/ (D) Lastly, this point is really important to me. Fair incentives are extremely important. Bitcoin only works because of incentives.
7/ (B) Some of the other strong teams I’ve looked at include Ethereum/Monero/Decred.
6/ (B) The development team is very important. Bitcoin has one of the best team. I believe SegWit is an amazing improvement to Bitcoin.
5/ (A) And to be fair, Litecoin is arguably just a copy/paste coin that is not that innovative.
4/ (A) Coins like Ethereum/Monero/Augur/Zcash/Decred bring a lot of innovation and trying a lot of cool things to push innovation.
